alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:56AM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Four Corners/Upper Dolores River, Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; San Juan River Basin
